item.title: House panel moves to consider criminal referrals for the Clintons
item.description: House lawmakers will vote this week on whether to refer Bill and Hillary Clinton to the DOJ over contempt of Congress in the Epstein probe.

item.title: Portland mayor demands ICE leave city after federal agents use tear gas on protesters 'Sickening decisions'

item.title: California AG sues hospital that ended gender transition treatment for minors to comply with Trump policies
item.description: California officials are suing a San Diego hospital after it ended gender transition care for minors amid threats from the Trump administration.
